org.apache.flink.yarn.cli

类 FlinkYarnCLI

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.yarn.cli.FlinkYarnCLI
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    CustomCommandLine<YarnClusterClientV2>

    public class FlinkYarnCLI
extends java.lang.Object
implements CustomCommandLine<YarnClusterClientV2>
    Class handling the command line interface to the YARN per job mode under flip-6.

      • retrieveCluster

        public YarnClusterClientV2 retrieveCluster(org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine cmdLine,
                                           Configuration config,
                                           java.lang.String configurationDirectory)
                                    throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        从接口复制的说明: CustomCommandLine
        Retrieves a client for a running cluster.
        指定者:
        retrieveCluster 在接口中 CustomCommandLine<YarnClusterClientV2>
        参数:
        cmdLine - The command-line parameters from the CliFrontend
        config - The Flink config
        configurationDirectory - Directory for configuration files
        返回:
        Client if a cluster could be retrieved
        抛出:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if the operation is not supported

      • createCluster

        public YarnClusterClientV2 createCluster(java.lang.String applicationName,
                                         org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine cmdLine,
                                         Configuration config,
                                         java.lang.String configurationDirectory,
                                         java.util.List<java.net.URL> userJarFiles)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: CustomCommandLine
        Creates the client for the cluster.
        指定者:
        createCluster 在接口中 CustomCommandLine<YarnClusterClientV2>
        参数:
        applicationName - The application name to use
        cmdLine - The command-line options parsed by the CliFrontend
        config - The Flink config to use
        configurationDirectory - Directory for configuration files
        userJarFiles - User jar files to include in the classpath of the cluster. @return The client to communicate with the cluster which the CustomCommandLine brought up.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - if the cluster could not be created
